channel.title: My Open Source Projects on Polyglott
channel.description: Recent content in My Open Source Projects on Polyglott

item.title: Chapi Go Toy Web Framework
item.author: ottog2486@gmail.com (Otto Giron)
item.description: On my quest of learning I heard about this relatively new language called go. I don’t remember well the details of why I had the desire of learning it, but as I normally do in order to learn a new language or tool, I write code to test the features and get an overview of what I can accomplish using it and… I also read the first chapters of this book: Programing in go

item.title: Weaselpecker v1.1.0 released and available on NPM
item.author: ottog2486@gmail.com (Otto Giron)
item.description: I few months ago I wrote a little module for mocking Waterline models, you can check my related post here “Weaselpecker: Node.js- Waterline Simple Mocking Library”. It seems the module was useful for some developers (which is great ðŸ˜€ ) so I took a few hours to review my code and add a couple extra features. I’ve released v1.1.0 which is available on NPM https://www.npmjs.com/package/weaselpecker. Installation npm install weaselpecker --save-dev Examples here https://github.
